TravelTriangle > Blog > Visakhapatnam > 8 Resorts In Visakhapatnam That Offer Great Hospitality & Exceptional Luxury 8 Resorts In Visakhapatnam That Offer Great Hospitality & Exceptional Luxury .. SHARES Updated Date: 16 January 2023 Cover Image Credit: Wikipedia Visakhapatnam, also known as Vizag or Waltair, is located on the east coast of the Bay of Bengal. It is also fondly referred to as the “Jewel of the East Coast.” Beautiful beaches, enchanting mountains and with the only natural harbour on the east coast, Visakhapatnam is an ideal tourist destination. Some of the finest resorts in Visakhapatnam lend a special aura to the city for travellers to enjoy luxurious accommodation here that too at an affordable cost. In fact, Visakhapatnam is a major tourist destination for various other reasons as well. The region is popular amongst travellers due to some fine beaches. Numerous resorts in Visakhapatnam near beach make for a satisfying stay wherein one can expect tremendous amounts of luxury. Table Of Content 8 Best Resorts In Visakhapatnam Enlisted below are 8 idyllic resorts in Visakhapatnam that can provide you with an ultimate comfort level and the best of convenience you seek in the lap of nature: 1. Sunray Village Resort Tucked in the Savaravilli village of Vizag, this village resort is unique in terms of its appearance as well as ensuring a completely pollution-free accommodation. It has been built artfully in an area of 340 acres where more than 28, 000 trees enhance its beauty. It is the place to be if you are keen and looking forward to reconnecting with nature. It ranks as one of the best luxury resorts in Visakhapatnam for pleasure as well as business tourists. Location: NH-5 at Bhogapuram, Visakhapatnam.Facilities: Choice of Deluxe and Executive Rooms complete with all the amenities of luxury; Private Pool Venues; Cricket Ground; Golf Course; Jogging Track; Fish Pond and Aquatic Area.Tariff: INR 6,000/- per night. All major Credit Cards and Debit Cards are accepted. Suggested Read: 25 Best Places To Visit In Visakhapatnam To Relish The True Charm Of This Coastal Gem! South Weekend Holiday Packages On TravelTriangle Delightful South Weekend Tour 3D/2N Package @ Rs 4,999 Plan your trip today! EMI option available. Book Now See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE.COM Visit Website 2. Sai Priya Beach Resorts Sai Priya Beach Resorts offers awe-inspiring scenery of turquoise Blue Sea waters of the Bay of Bengal with its waves stroking against white sand. Guests can behold the breathtaking panoramic views of the surroundings from their rooms. If you are the one looking to sense that feeling through resorts in Visakhapatnam near beach, you don’t have to look beyond Sai Priya! Location: #5/170, Rushikonda, Visakhapatnam.Facilities: 4 types of rooms – Standard Room, Classic Room, Premium Room and Deluxe Room. Imposing lawns, round the clock, open in-house bar, Conference Hall.Tariff: INR 2,500/- per night. Suggested Read: 8 Charming Places To Visit In Vizag In Summer For Your Trip To Andhra Pradesh 3. V Resorts Vizag Palms Surrounded by lush green Eastern Ghats on one side and the Bay of Bengal on the other, V Resorts Vizag Palms maintains its typical identity in terms of its strategic location advantage. As a traveler staying in this resort, you will feel how the region is blessed by stunning views of both the mountains and the sea at all times to make you amused. It is also known for being one of the coziest and most suitable luxurious resorts in Visakhapatnam for family travellers. Location: Bheemili, Visakhapatnam.Facilities: 3 types of accommodation – Executive, Deluxe Room and Deluxe Suite. Rooftop Swimming Pool.Tariff: Starting from INR 2,800/- per night. Suggested Read: Araku Valley Guide: 6 Experiences To Go Off The Beaten Path In Andhra Pradesh! 4. Haritha Beach Resort APTDC Managed by the Andhra Pradesh Tourism Development Corporation, Haritha Beach Resort promises you economical delight with no compromise on quality. It is surrounded by thriving greenery and offers a magnificent view of the Blue Sea nearby that makes your stay even more memorable. It is the most ideal of the resorts in Visakhapatnam for family, being a government-run property facilitating all the comforts sought. Location: Bheemili, Visakhapatnam.Facilities: 5 types of accommodation – AC Deluxe, AC Executive, AC Standard, AC Luxury and President Suite.Tariff: Starting from INR 2,000/- per night. Suggested Read: 15 Fascinating Things To Do In Visakhapatnam For A Captivating Vacation 5. Bay Leaf Resort If you are the one who has this belief that relaxation is not a luxury but a necessity, then head straight to Bay Leaf Resort in Visakhapatnam. An authentic Ayurvedic spa resort, this place is a haven to swim, stretch, sleep, refresh, renew and rejuvenate yourself in the leisure. It is one of the best resorts in Visakhapatnam with ample scope for you to indulge in multiple types of activities. Location: Ocean Drive, Sagar Nagar, Visakhapatnam.Facilities: 2 types of accommodation- Cottage Room and Deluxe Cottage RoomTariff: Starting from INR 3,500/- per night. Suggested Read: 8 Best Hotels In Visakhapatnam: Know The Right Options For Great Stays 6. Bheemili Resort Managed by Accor Hotels, this property is one of the highly-rated luxury resorts in Visakhapatnam. It is an ideal gateway for both leisure & business travellers. The rising of the Sun on the east coast over the ocean would be a lasting memory to the guests at the Bheemli Resort. It is equally a great romantic gateway as well as being one of the best and luxurious resorts in Visakhapatnam for couples to spend quality romantic moments together. Location: Bheemili Beach Road, Bheemunipatnam, Visakhapatnam.Facilities: 2 Types of accommodation – Deluxe Room with Double Bed and Deluxe Room with a Queen Bed. Both rooms with best amenities including free Wi-Fi and other related services.Tariff: Starting from INR 5,300/- per night. Suggested Read: Mahabalipuram Temples: Visit These 10 Breathtakingly Beautiful South Indian Souls 7. Bay Breeze Resorts Bay Breeze Resorts is a preferred destination for tourists and business travellers alike. With an excellent sea view, this resort lives up to its name as the sea breezes massage the tired muscles of the tourists and relax them smoothly. Convenient and comfortable, it comes under the category of cheap resorts in Visakhapatnam to be reckoned with. You can’t ignore accommodation here that too when you are asked to pay too less as compared to the facilities offered. Location: Beach Road 347/9A, Thimmapuram, Visakhapatnam.Facilities: Cable Television, Air-conditioner, Electronic Safe and an Attached Bathroom with other essential toiletries.Tariff: INR 2,200/- per night. Suggested Read: 10 Amazing Things To Do In Pachmarhi For A Fun-Filled Getaway In The Heart Of India 8. Senora Beach Resort It is one of the most sought after resorts in Visakhapatnam for couples that offer comfort for stay and value for money spent. With a 24-hour checkout facility, it is convenient too for the tourists arriving from various destinations any time and every time. Location: Sagar Nagar, Visakhapatnam.Facilities: Air-conditioner, Cable TV, Multi-cuisine Restaurant, Tea Lounge and Bar, DJ Dance floor.Tariff: Periodical discount rates are available. Tariffs vary as per the accommodation chosen. Further Read: 15 Places To Visit Near Madurai: The Gateway To Enjoying South India’s Beauty Visakhapatnam is an economical and enjoyable tourist destination. Spend your holidays in the lap of nature without being affected by the budget and pollution. Time to pack your bags for Visakhapatnam now and ensure you get to spend some amazing time in this Jewel of a city! Frequently Asked Questions About Resorts In Visakhapatnam Are resorts in Visakhapatnam safe for the families? Visakhapatnam is a tourist destination for hundreds of thousands of travellers flocking here every year. It is fully safe and secure for the families. Does any resort in Visakhapatnam have a pool? Several of the high-end resorts in Visakhapatnam have pools on their property for tourists. A few have rooftop pools too. Can I find parking for my car at the resorts? Yes, finding a place for your car to park at any of the resorts is easy. All resorts have large areas demarcated for parking guest vehicles. Can I cancel my reservation made at resorts? Every resort has its own cancellation policy. Just check the relevant resort website and follow the instructions. Looking To Book A Holiday Package?
